40 days of suffering in the highlands of
Thanh Hoa province. 66 preschool children of Trung Ly commune,
highland district.  happy border for a while Still having to
study in a makeshift bamboo-walled room
at the school site at Kham Hai Boarding
School of Trung Ly Kindergarten, the cold wind blows in,
making the preschool children turn purple in their hands and feet. Two makeshift
classrooms are owned by the
local people's school.  The method built so that children
have a place to study is only about 30 meters wide. The box is made of
bamboo and covered with corrugated iron. In
winter, the weather is harsh and cold winds
penetrate into the classroom, making the students cold and purple. In the
summer, the classroom is as hot as
fire.  In the winter, the cold weather
affects the health of students and the quality of
teaching. On rainy days, this area is
covered with fog until it clears until noon
due to the harsh climate. Because of the harsh climate,
many children study in makeshift rooms.  It is
known that the management board of
Trung Ly Kindergarten and the local government
have repeatedly asked the District People's Committee
to build a solid classroom
at the school in Ban Kham Hai so that
parents can feel secure when taking their children.
However, up to now this request has not been
resolved by the People's Committee of Muong Lat district,
so dozens of preschool children still have to
study in makeshift bamboo-walled rooms. The

According to the State Bank,
non-cash payment activities continue to
grow, in which payment via
QR Code scanning tends to
sharply increase payment indicators.  Non-
cash use has a good growth rate in
January 2024 compared to the same period in 2023.
The number of non-cash payment transactions
increased by 60 minutes, especially payments via the
cost promotion method increased by nearly 900 minutes
in quantity and  The value of the
payment method of withdrawing money through
ATMs decreased by 15 minutes, showing the trend of
shifting from cash payment
to non-cash payment. The
State Bank said it would continue to
coordinate with  Relevant ministries and branches
effectively and synchronously implement
solutions in the
Non-cash payment development project for the period
2021-2025, plan for digital transformation of the banking industry
and strategy for developing
payment systems  Vietnam to

and Nguyen Hue street last night. This is
one of the outstanding activities of the
festival.  Ho Chi Minh City Ao Dai for the 10th time,
according to the organizers of the preliminary round competition,
there are nearly 1,000 registered contestants
from districts of Thu Duc city,
schools, departments, unions,
and participating teams.  The semi-final free competition
has 30 participating teams selected by the organizing committee
from the best teams. The
jury is made up of experts in the field of
culture, arts and tourism. Continuing the
success of previous years of the competition.  The
2024 Ao Dai Festival will be held
with many innovations to increase scale and
professionalism. This is also an opportunity for
people and tourists to show their love
for Vietnamese Ao Dai

Th Long belongs to Phuc high-speed train joint stock company.
Quoc transported more than 1,000
passengers from the stone bridge of Vung
Tau City to the lagoon port of Con Dao district
safely. This event marked the first time a
large speedboat exploited and
operated maritime routes.  From the mainland
to the offshore islands of
Vietnam, the Tha Long high-speed boat is more than 77 m long,
nearly 9.5 m wide and can accommodate up to 1,017
passengers. The train has three floors using three
modern German-made engines with a total of  The
ship's capacity is nearly 12,000 horsepower. Achieving speeds
of up to 32 knots per hour helps shorten
the time from Vung Tau to the island to just
over 3 hours. Can operate
in harsh weather conditions
such as gusts of wind  level 8,
wave height up to 6 m, I felt very happy because
I was one of the first 107 passengers
on the first train of the
Thang Long super train going from V City
to Con Dao.
Built by the 189 member limited liability company of the
Ministry of National Defense, this is the
largest single-hull speedboat in Vietnam
to date, with a running time of about
3 hours and 40 minutes to reach the island.  Then
the speed is very high even though the weather
at sea in Asia is up to level S level 7
the ship departs from Vung Tau at 7:30 on
Wednesdays and in the opposite direction
departs from Dam Dao port.  at 13:00 on

broke out in the area.  The fire in District 12, Ho
Chi Minh City caused many
people to panic and run away
from the column of
black smoke. Initial information was that around 10 p.m.,

Trung My Tay Ward, District 12, saw a
black mass.  There was a fire with a burning smell
when they went out to see, many people panicked when they
saw a fierce fire in a
prefabricated house containing scrap, many

shouted for everyone to escape the area.
However, the fire area had
many flaming objects, so the fire
broke out very quickly, causing the entire shrimp machine to collapse.  They
mobilized many
firefighting vehicles and dozens of
officers and soldiers to the scene to extinguish the fire. The
soldiers deployed firefighting plans
from many directions to prevent the fire from spreading about 20
minutes after the fire was basically
controlled. The fire did not cause any damage.  There was loss of
life but a lot of property was destroyed. The
cause of the fire is being investigated and
clarified. Last evening, a fire broke out
in the violating vehicle of the
police of Tanh Linh district, Binh Thuan province, causing
pedestrians on Hoang Street.
At about 6:45 p.m., a fire suddenly broke out
in the illegal parking lot within the premises
of the Tanh Linh district police headquarters. The fire
burned fiercely and the wind pushed a black column of peeled blocks
more than 20 meters high, radiating to the entire electric meter line area.  The
fence was also damaged by Lang's wing. The fire became
more and more intense and red in the night,
accompanied by explosions. Many passersby had to
stop their cars to ensure safety. That's right, a
local resident said the fire was so
big that cars didn't dare to drive through.  The
local police were sent to ensure security and
order. The Giay medical and emergency police force
stationed in Tanh Linh district,
more than 15 km away, were sent to the scene to
extinguish the fire. The
damage and cause have not yet been determined.  The
fire case of 25-year-old Nguyen Quoc Bao
committed murder in Tay Ninh and then
fled Cambodia.
This particularly dangerous subject hid his identity but
did not escape the law. He was arrested by the
provincial police force.  Arrested
and handed over to Tay Ninh province police to
investigate the
previous murder. Due to conflicts on
social networks, he and four other subjects were carrying
dangerous weapons. Searched and beheaded a group of
five people causing trouble.  He was seriously injured after
committing the crime and said he fled to Cambodia on
August 25, 2023. The
Police Investigation Agency of Tay Ninh province prosecuted
defendant Nguyen Quoc Bao and his accomplices
for murder and issued a decision to
prosecute.  According to
professional measures, the Tay Ninh police
received information that the subject was
hiding and living as a hired laborer in
S Ring province. The
Police Investigation Agency office immediately reported to the Police Department.  The
Director of the Provincial Police sent a working group to
coordinate with the police force of Singapore
Cambodia province to conduct an investigation and verify the suspect.

A man in India underwent
a special surgery to help him
return to normal activities.
This person received a wing transplant.  the hand of a
woman. The doctors involved in the
complex surgery said that the person who received the hand transplant was
a Buddhist monk. He received a pair of Western organ donors
from Mina, a woman who died of
brain death but had previously pledged to donate.  The organ
for
Universal Medicine was carried out immediately after
we received consent from the
family. The donor's blood types
also matched, so we
performed the hand transplant after doing the
necessary medical assessment.  Si Garam Hospital where
the surgery was performed said this was the
first surgery of this type to be
performed in the capital. New Daily
local media said the
complex surgery lasted 12 hours
and was performed.  performed in January The
hand transplant patient is now recovering steadily.
